definition: to breathe/to suck in/to absorb/to inhale

sentences.english: Their blood feedings are part of reproduction.
sentences.chinese: 他们吸食血液也是繁殖的一部分。

sentences.english: Use of smokeless tobacco also raises the risk.
sentences.chinese: 即使吸食低焦油的烟草也同样会提高患病风险。

sentences.english: They even forced him to take heroin.
sentences.chinese: 他们甚至强迫他吸食海洛因。

sentences.english: For the last 4 months, my partner and I have been recreationally using heroin.
sentences.chinese: 上4个月，我的女友和我为了取乐而吸食了海洛因。

sentences.english: The official cause of death was acute morphine poisoning caused by an accidental overdose.
sentences.chinese: 其法定的死因是过量吸食毒品而引起的意外急性中毒。

sentences.english: The parasite plants itself to the adult bee and sucks the bee blood.
sentences.chinese: 这种寄生虫在成年蜜蜂身上寄生吸食蜜蜂的血液。

sentences.english: The mosquito was lying on her forehead, drinking blood from her voraciously .
sentences.chinese: 蚊子趴在她的额头，贪婪地吸食着她的血。

sentences.english: Li Xiong taught me how to take Ketamine.
sentences.chinese: 李雄教我怎样吸食“小麻”。

sentences.english: With all their marijuana, They won't give me a puff.
sentences.chinese: 我们爱吸食大麻，他们却一口也不要我抽。

sentences.english: She got through the day alertly, despite being on drugs.
sentences.chinese: 尽管吸食了毒品，她还是很警惕地度过了那一天。

sentences.english: I will tell you something : Someone who has overdosed on drugs needs to keep moving .
sentences.chinese: 容我提醒你，吸食毒品过量的人必须不停地走动。

sentences.english: Lured by the Hong Kong businessmen, Liao Feng started taking drugs.
sentences.chinese: 在港商的引诱下，廖凤开始吸食毒品。

sentences.english: There have been rumours that Dylan was involved with heroin.
sentences.chinese: 以前就有传言说迪伦曾经吸食过海洛因。

sentences.english: You overdosed on heroin last night.
sentences.chinese: 你昨晚海洛因吸食过量。

sentences.english: These bugs drink much sap every day.
sentences.chinese: 这些虫子每天吸食许多树液。

definition: to breathe in/to suck in/to inhale
